attributes.action: Allow President Donald Trump a State Visit to the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
I will like the government to see in comparism how many people in the country don't mind having President Donald Trump for a State visit in the United Kingdom.

We have over 65 Million people in the country. The views of the country must be equally represented.
attributes.background:
Donald trump's action to Ban Muslim's from 7 countries has sparked a lot of reaction across the globe. There is a mixture of political, social and religious protest against his Executive Order. Personally, I think we should give him a chance to do his Job.

We can draw him close to influence him.
